description: This file defines a singly linked list data structure with basic operations such as add, remove, size, and get by index. It includes an internal Node class and utility functions for list traversal.

classes.name: LinkedList
classes.description: A singly linked list implementation with methods for adding, removing, retrieving size, and accessing elements by index.

classes.name: Node
classes.description: An internal class representing a node in the linked list, holding data and reference to the next node.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new element to the end of the linked list.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes the first occurrence of an element from the list.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Returns the number of elements in the list.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the element at the specified index.

methods.name: unlink
methods.description: Internal method to unlink a node from the list, adjusting pointers appropriately.

methods.name: tail
methods.description: Utility function to find the last node in a list starting from a given head.
